channel.title: Gitlab on NZ's Digital Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Gitlab on NZ's Digital Garden

item.title: Gitlab
item.description: CI/CD Pipeline Skip a pipeline To push a commit without triggering a pipeline, add [ci skip] or [skip ci] , using any capitalization, to your commit message. Alternatively, if you are using Git 2.10 or later, use the ci.skip Git push option . The ci.skip push option does not skip merge request pipelines. git push --push-option=ci.skip or git push -o ci.skip.
